FuncDef: This command configures the set of BGP address families (AFI plus SAFI) to be supported by the applicable VPRN BGP sessions.
CLIs: family [ ipv4 ] [ label-ipv4 ] [ ipv6 ] [ mcast-ipv4 ] [ flow-ipv4 ] [ mcast-ipv6 ] [ flow-ipv6 ]

ParaDef.Info: Adds support for the IPv4 unicast (unlabeled) address family.
Adds support for the IPv4 unicast (labeled) address family.
Adds support for the IPv6 unicast (unlabeled) address family.
Adds support for the IPv4 multicast SAFI address family.
Adds support for the IPv4 flow-spec address family.
Adds support for the IPv4 multicast SAFI address family.
Adds support for the IPv4 flow-spec address family.
